sentences.en: Cervical cancer is highly curable if it is found early.
sentences.cn: 如果及早发现,宫颈癌治愈的机会很高.

sentences.en: Conclusions Annual spiral CT screening can detect lung cancer that is curable.
sentences.cn: 结论:每年一次螺旋CT筛查有助于发现可治愈的早期肺癌.

sentences.en: I hear from an authority that this disease is curable.
sentences.cn: 我听一位权威人士说,这个病能治好.

sentences.en: In addition, such as UV - curable inks, electron - beam curing inks.
sentences.cn: 另外, 如UV固化油墨 、 电子束固化油墨等.

sentences.en: It is possible that PEEK University is curable in air.
sentences.cn: 在空气气氛中,聚醚醚酮存在热交联的可能.

sentences.en: It was found out that the disease was curable.
sentences.cn: 那种疾病已发现可以治疗.

sentences.en: Most skin cancers are completely curable if detected in the early stages.
sentences.cn: 如果及早发现，大多数皮肤癌都是完全可以治愈的。

sentences.en: Most skin cancers are curable if treated early.
sentences.cn: 如果及早治疗，多数的皮肤癌是可治好的。

sentences.en: On 437 a polymerization, solvent - type development to heat curable, photocurable - more than one type.
sentences.cn: 上光涂料已由氧化聚合型, 溶剂挥发型发展到热固化型 、 光固化 型 多个类型.

sentences.en: Recently made the metal UV - curable inkjet cards and membership card production system.
sentences.cn: 最近提出了金属UV固化喷墨制卡和会员卡制作系统的方案.

sentences.en: Some types of cancer are curable.
sentences.cn: 有些癌症是可以治愈的.

sentences.en: TB is curable with a course of special medicines called antibiotics.
sentences.cn: 结核病可通过一些名为抗生素的专用药物治愈.

sentences.en: The tumor in his prostate gland was caught at an early and very likely curable stage.
sentences.cn: 由于他的前列腺肿瘤是在早期被发现的,处在很有可能治愈阶段.
肺结核是一种可治愈的病.

sentences.en: Type A H 1 N 1 influenza is preventable, controllable and curable.
sentences.cn: 甲型H1N1流感可防 、 可控、可治.

trans.tran_en: an illness that is curable can be cured
